entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Maybe Trump's is staging this whole coronavirus epidemic so he can show off how he closed the Border and halted flights from China.  because we know they are bringing crime they're bringing drugs they're bringing Coronavirus?  Or Trump wants an excuse to suspend the election?
